mapper.select: SELECT CL.id,CL.clubName, u.name as clubCeoName, CL.clubLocation, u.phone,categoryId, categoryName, CL.foundationDate, cS.instagramLink, cS.facebookLink FROM hsca219.club as CL LEFT JOIN hsca219.category CA ON CA.id = CL.categoryId LEFT JOIN hsca219.user u ON CL.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN hsca219.clubSNS cS ON CL.id = cS.clubId where CA.id = #{categoryId} AND clubName LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select id FROM club order by regdate DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT CL.id,CL.clubName,CL.userId, u.name as clubCeoName,CL.clubLocation,CL.clubDescription,u.phone,categoryId,categoryName,CL.foundationDate,cS.instagramLink,cS.facebookLink ,cI.originalUrl, cI.fileOrder FROM hsca219.club as CL LEFT JOIN clubImage cI on CL.id = cI.clubId LEFT JOIN category c on c.id = CL.categoryId LEFT JOIN user u on u.id = CL.userId LEFT JOIN clubSNS cS on CL.id = cS.clubId where c.id = #{categoryId} and CL.id = #{clubId} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM club ORDER BY regdate DESC LIMIT #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
SELECT cI.originalUrl FROM hsca219.club as CL ,hsca219.clubImage cI where CL.id = cI.clubId and CL.id = #{clubId} order by `fileOrder`

SELECT CL.id,CL.clubName, u.name as clubCeoName, CL.clubLocation, u.phone,categoryId, categoryName, CL.foundationDate, cS.instagramLink, cS.facebookLink FROM hsca219.club as CL LEFT JOIN hsca219.category CA ON CA.id = CL.categoryId LEFT JOIN hsca219.user u ON CL.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN hsca219.clubSNS cS ON CL.id = cS.clubId
WHERE clubName LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY clubName
SELECT id,clubName FROM hsca219.club order by club.regdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hsca219.clubImage (clubId, originalUrl,fileOrder) SELECT #{clubId},#{originalUrl},#{fileOrder} WHERE #{originalUrl} != ' '
mapper.update: UPDATE club SET userId = null WHERE id = #{clubId}
